content: First so all, the text down to Help me bro is a combination of 2 posts 1 to Bergy in the Cafe' Renee thread with the except of I changed Damn Bergy to Dear Bergy and 2nd post to Mikey: Dear Bergy, I was just getting to know you. I screwed up some too on military.com, quite a few times, especially when I first came on the boards, but also as recently as today, ask the Marine MODs Even paid one discretion with a 6 month suspension. I hope you will reconsider. I'd appreciate it. I need someone to play the word games with. 2nd post I got off suspension July 2007 and would like to think I learned my lesson. I still screw up and when I do, I will always apologize. I am no better than anyone else. I have always had the personality that rubs people the wrong way. I guess you could say I am strong willed. This site is like home to me. I can't tell you how many times members here have comforted me, got on me when I fooked up, and turned my sheety day into a good one. The Marines on the MODF taught me alot and have made me a better person, I am grateful and apprecative of that, I hope to find the same on the General Discussions forum Bergy, if you leave, I'm gonna fook up. Help me, bro. I only meet Bergy a few days now.... Since then he has already comforted me, in a "manlove way" , one vet to another. He has taught me some too already. I can tell he is a good man and veteran. He has been a good friend to many of you. In our short friendship, he has extended a hand, not always lovinglee, but he extended it, and I knew it was real. Well, I could go... I'll finish my experience by saying "Whatever decision you make, I'm 100% covering your 6, and I hope I have the opportunity to get to know you better." Man, I enjoyed your company. Salute I admit, I got the eye sweat. Damn I hate when that happens

content: We all make mistakes from time to time...and, upon being cognizant of such...said miscues are often rectified...made correct, and we all move on...and have become better people for doing so. I have made more tham my fair share these damn near 9 years on this site...even suspended myself for a couple of months for doing so... Just a part of being human... Bergy made a boo-boo...as we all do...and admitted to such. His departure is unnecessary and unwarranted! If he left of his own choice...that is his decision...albeit, not the right choice, I feel in my opinion. Now, if he decided to leave because he was given an alternative...the person, or persons responsible will have to deal with me... take it for what it is worth. I pray that this did not happen... Bergy is one of the few friends/extended family members on this site that I can place my full trust in...and I hold him in the highest respect there is. I do hope that he does reconsider and return here...his presence is a large asset to this community.
